scene_metadata.title: Return to the Studio
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: how to continue after touching the ineffable

dialogue.context: the jungle vanishes into the architect's studio
dialogue.text: And then, they changed the track. Back to "reality." Door gone. What now? How to continue?

psychological_notes: The return to ordinary reality after touching the transcendent poses unique challenges. The architect acknowledges the jarring transition from ineffable experience back to consensus reality. The question 'How to continue?' captures the universal challenge of integration - how do we live ordinary life after extraordinary experience?
philosophical_underpinning: The spiritual journey includes both ascent and return; integration is as important as transcendence
therapeutic_direction: Supporting the challenging transition from peak experience back to daily life
